General.Name: Kyndryl Holdings Inc
General.Description: Kyndryl Holdings, Inc. operates as a technology services company and IT infrastructure services provider worldwide. The company offers cloud services; core enterprise and zCloud services; application, data, and artificial intelligence services; digital workplace services; security and resiliency services; and network services and edge services. It serves financial, technology, media and telecom, retail and travel, and automotive industries. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in New York, New York.
General.Address: One Vanderbilt Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10017
